remarks:
Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jul-1995.) 

---

 Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitition. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jul-1995.)
statement:
cbvex4v.1 $e |- ( ( x = v /\ y = u ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvex4v.2 $e |- ( ( z = f /\ w = g ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
cbvex4v $p |- ( E. x E. y E. z E. w ph <-> E. v E. u E. f E. g ch ) $.
$d ch w z $.
$d f g ps $.
$d f w $.
$d g z $.
$d ph u v $.
$d ps x y $.
$d u v w x y z $.
